item.title: TSM
item.description: score:27 Chances: The Biden administration’s pledge of $1.5 billion in grants to GlobalFoundries signifies a major opportunity for the domestic semiconductor industry to revitalize. Investors are bullish on the chance for more gains in shares of Nvidia Corp.’s top memory supplier SK Hynix Inc.
